description:
All of a sudden, a gigantic elevator soars up in the sky of new frontier coast. And on the top of this towering elevator, Queen Miya Higashikazuno is laughing loudly in the center of swarming girls in extra-tight bikini-suits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goukakenran Baku Chichi Taikai, Odaiba no Sora o Tsuranuite Desu
Luxurious Tournament of Huge Boobs! Pierce the Skies of Odaiba
豪華絢爛爆乳大会 お台場の空をつらぬいてです~
